content: > **please note ** this pattern is free to > view in its entirety on my blog 1 this > ad-free downloadable pdf enables me to > be able to bring you more free > patterns in the future go to the free pattern here 2 **description ** earrings are a fun and quick way to show off your crochet skills on a daily basis make a few and you can wear outside wait for the compliments to roll in because they will better still is that crochet earrings are so light you barely feel them on your ears and if you re like me these make great gifts too you may sell all finished products made from this pattern however you may not share sell or distribute this pattern in any way in whole or in part i would greatly appreciate a link back to my shop or this pattern anytime you sell this item online gauge listed in pattern written in us crochet terms you may not use any of the photos from this listing or the ones contained in the pattern to sell your item you must take your own photos do not create a pattern based on my pattern copyright @ divine debris 2012 - 2020 no part of this document may be reproduced or transmitted in any form by any means electronic mechanical photocopying or otherwise without prior written permission from the author sales of finished product are permitted but designer requests that you link back to pattern and credit divine debris with the original design under the creative commons attribution-share alike license if you have any questions comments or concerns please contact info@divinedebris com 1 https //divinedebris com/mini-mandala/ 2 https //divinedebris com/mini-mandala/
